news.title: Watch the Trailer for Hulu’s New King of the Hill Revival
news.summary: Hank, Peggy, Bobby, and the rest of the gang from Mike Judge’s beloved TV show return in August

news.title: MJ Lenderman, Sun June, and More Cover Jason Molina Songs for New Tribute Album
news.summary: I Will Swim to You: A Tribute to Jason Molina also features Hand Habits, Advance Base, Friendship, and others

news.title: Jens Lekman Announces Tour and New Album, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: Songs for Other People’s Weddings is due out in September

news.title: Paul McCartney Announces 2025 North American Tour
news.summary: Including shows in Atlanta, Montreal, Chicago, and Buffalo, as well as his first-ever dates in Albuquerque and the Greater Palm Springs area
